price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ ខ្ញុំខ្លាចពួកអ្នកទទួលរងនូវទារុណកម្ម នៅថ្ងៃដ៏ធំធេង(ថ្ងៃបរលោក) ។
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
